description:
Having seen the movie Twelve Angry Men, Keroro is hoping to be the only person on the jury to convince the others that Giroro isn`t guilty.  But when everyone unanimously agrees that he isn`t, Keroro switches strategies... to change his verdict to "guilty"!  Later on, a dinosaur appears on Earth, only to discover that his species is extinct and has been replaced by humans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, 5 Shocked Keronians / Fuyuki, Planet of the Humans
ケロロ 5人の呆れるケロン人 / 冬樹 人間の惑星
